snippet: KAUFMAN--Robert. To my dear friend for over 60 years whose wisdom, kindness and generosity has meant so much to me over the years. My husband, Richard, loves and respects Bob as I do. Bob will be missed and mourned by both of us forever. Marilyn Davimos 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAUFMAN--Robert. To my dear friend for over 60 years whose wisdom, kindness and generosity has meant so much to me over the years. My husband, Richard, loves and respects Bob as I do. Bob will be missed and mourned by both of us forever. Marilyn Davimos 1/3
